Translations.Text: Ad brunt wallen, ddell iwwet iten. Ni$ pwanecden ar lekni, mi llan ueeean
Eoo iyI akked wid iskaddben awal agi. Ad asen Ddu$ cwii, cwii, seg wanda ur eoin
Ad asen Fke$ lmudda. Ni$ tieeoci W teeweo
Ne$ tessutrev taqdiat, fellasen d iilaba eeayen
Eubeo i ooay n Mass ik, ur ppili am bu uslem, i d issawlen mi ippueeyyeo
Lemmer ur t id issukkes l$it n Mass is, a d iu$al ar lxali, d amaafun
Ifren it Mass is, Irra t seg iaaoviyen
Qoib i k smalen ijehliyen, s wallen nnsen, mi slan i usmekti. La qqaoen: "ar neppa d aoehbani
Neppa, d asmekti kan i imavalen
D acu ay d tin imueeppmen
W ar ak imlen d acu p, tin imueeppmen
Tamud akked Aad skaddben tin ipoueun
Ieeppem it, fellasen, ua wavan, iam wussan, d imezgi. A pwaliv din imdanen seoaan, am ize$woan n tezdayt iruzen
Twalav ma illa wacu d igwran segsen
